name: techdocs
description: Resources provided by the CNCF Technical Documentation team.

scripts._check:markdown:all: npm run -s _list:check:md | xargs -I {} -P 4 npx -p markdownlint-cli markdownlint -c .markdownlint.yaml {}
scripts._check:markdown:delta: npm run -s _list:git:delta | xargs -I {} npx -p markdownlint-cli markdownlint -c .markdownlint.yaml {}
scripts.check:format: npm run _check:format || (echo '[help] Run: npm run fix:format'; exit 1)
scripts.check:links: bash -c 'for f in *.md `find docs analyses -name "*.md"`; do npx markdown-link-check@3.12.2 --config .markdown-link-check.json -p -v $f || exit 1; done'
scripts.seq: bash -c 'for cmd in "$@"; do npm run $cmd || exit 1; done' -

author: CNCF
NOTE: We've pinned markdown-link-check to 3.12.2 due to a bug in 3.13.x stream, both in the devDeps below and the check:links script above. For details, see https://github.com/tcort/markdown-link-check/issues/369.
